item.title: Classic games from my youth
item.description: Here’s a summary of my youth, in alphabetical order. What are your nostalgic games? :) Abuse Aladdin Alien Phobia Alley Cat Apache Strike Arkanoid Battle City (nes) Big Red Racing Blood Blues Brothers Bomberman (nes) Bubble Bobble California Games 2 Cannon Fodder Captain Comic Capture The Flag Carmageddon 2 CD-Man (Pac-man clone) Command & Conquer Cosmo´s Cosmic Adventure Crusader: No Remorse Crystal Caves 3 Cyberdogs Day Of The Tentacle Death Rally Dig Dug Doom Down By The Laituri Duck Tales Duke Nukem 3D Dune 2 Earthworm Jim 1 Full Throttle Genewars God Of Thunder Goonies Grand Theft Auto 2 Heroes Of Might And Magic 2 Hitman Hugo 3: Jungle Of Doom Indiana Jones And The Last Crusade Interstate 76 Invataxi James Pond 2 Jazz Jackrabbit Joust Keen 1-6 Kops Leisure Suit Larry 6 Lemmings License To Kill Liero Lion King Lode Runner Lotus 3 Master Of Magic Mechwarrior 2 Mig 29: Fulcrum Mine Bombers Molez Need For Speed: Hot Pursuit 2 Nox Oddworld: Abe´s Oddysee One Must Fall: 2097 Paperboy Pea Shootin’ Pete Pipe Mania Pitfall Pontifex 2 Prince Of Persia Quake 1 Raptor-call Of The Shadows Rayman 1 Redneck Rampage Rex Nebular Rise Of The Triad Sam-n-max: hit The Road Secret Agent Mission 2 Serf City Settlers 3 Sim City 2000 Sim Farm Sim Tower Sim Town Ski Or Die Skyroads Slicks N Slides Space Wars Spy Hunter Star Control 2 Star Control 3 Starcraft 1 Star Wars: tie Fighter Street Rod 2 Stunts Supaplex Syndicate Wars Tapan Kaikki Tapper Taso Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Terminal Velocity Terra Nova: strike Force Centauri Test Drive 3 The Dig The Incredible Machine Theme Park Time Commando Tomb Raider 2 Transport Tycoon Deluxe Triplane Turmoil Turok: dinosaur Hunter Ufo: Enemy Unknown V2000 Wacky Wheels Warcraft 2 Wings Wolfenstein 3d Worms: World Party
